DOC.criteria: Able willing comply treatment/followup schedule requirement Able understand provide write Informed Consent ETDRS visual acuity equal worse 20/32 ( best correct ) Age 50 80 year old Pupil dilate least 6 mm Subject able fixate Grade 14 nuclear sclerotic cataract ( LOCS III ) Axial length 22 26 mm Pregnant , intend become pregnant course study , less 3 month postpartum less 6 week completion breastfeed Participation study another device drug within 3 month prior study enrollment study , per Investigator 's careful discretion , long contradictory criterion Any condition , Investigator 's opinion , would make unsafe ( subject study personnel ) treat subject part research study cataract surgery contraindicate Anterior chamber depth ( anterior corneal surface anterior capsule margin ) less 2.5 mm via IOL Master ( Zeiss ) .
